title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: S. E. Colburn to F. N. Clark, February 29, 1868
summary: Colburn reports on a meeting he had with Cyrus Bannister, who explained that problems with his wife compelled him to leave his family three years earlier, although Colburn reports that Bannister intends to return to his family in the spring.
keywords: Family, Community Values/Local Behavior, American Civil War
